title: Bug 9619 - Move static member: Dialog details
description: Bug 9619 - Move static member: Dialog details 20020212a. Mnemonicsb. No validation on the type field. Type existence is not too expensive (already done in the type wizard for the superclass) and should be implemented here as well. At least 'isValidTypeName' functionality should be added.f. The label should be updated to say 'Select destination type:'g.
OB: - The browse button is too small. It should use SWTUtil for standard button sizes.- The title is used for long text. When going to the next page, it incorrectly displays 'Type not found'.- The dialog shows types from all source folders, including those from other projects. It should only display types from the source folders of the own project.- The destination type can be the same as the source type. Refactoring should not incorrectly warn about resulting errors and should not make pseudo-changes in referencing classes.
